name: Put update comments

testSteps.description: 1: Put update comments ({id=1, comments="I think I should shift to the moon"})

Put update comments

PUT https://dummyjson.com/comments/1

X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff

Content-Length: 105
Etag: W/"69-SgRwLRLIN5xU9LYGg1gKIu5PwIM"

Via: 1.1 vegur

children.description: Then Status code should be 200 OK
And Respon body should be id 1 and comments "I think I should shift to the moon"
And Validate put update comments with valid json
Post new comments
